Class Block.Context

java.lang.Object
ca.yorku.cmg.cnsim.bitcoin.Block.Context
Enclosing class:
Block
public static class Block.Context extends Object
Contains information about the lifecycle of the block.
Author:
Sotirios Liaskos for the Enterprise Systems Group @ York University
